description: "This map shows the islands of Java, Sumatra and Borneo, the straits of Sunda, Malacca and Bangka, and the Gulf of Siam. The title is given in both French and Dutch, as are some of the place names on the map."
title: "Carte des Isles de Java, Sumatra Borneo &a. les detroits de la Sunde, Malaca, et Banca, Golfe de Siam &a / par N. Bellin Ingr. de la Marine ; J. V. Schley direx."
